item.title: Diff and Patch
item.description: Every now and then, we'd face situations where we're being asked to replace, keep or examine two different files – such as when a new Ubuntu package comes with a new config file. It's easy when we know whether to keep the old one or replace it altogether with the newer version, but what do we do when we're unsure and/or need to reconcile the difference between them? diff and patch comes to mind.
